wikitext.*:
{{ardayearheader|2948|2949|2950|2951|2952|2953|2954}}

* [[Sauron]] declares himself openly and gathers power in [[Mordor]]. He begins the rebuilding of [[Barad-dûr]].<ref name="TA">{{App|TA}}</ref><ref name=stew>{{App|Stewards}}</ref>
* The remaining [[Gondorians]] of [[Ithilien]] start to flee.<ref name=stew/> 
* [[Gollum]], who is at the outskirts of [[Mirkwood]], presumably on his way to [[Eriador]], feels the call of the [[Shadow]] from the South<ref name=shadow>{{FR|Shadow}}</ref> and turns towards [[Mordor]].<ref name="TA"/>
* The [[Elves of Mirkwood]] lose the tracks of Gollum. [[Gandalf]] also neglects the matter for many years, occupied with other thoughts.<ref name=shadow/>
* [[Sauron]] sends [[Khamûl]]<ref>{{UT|Hunt}}, note 1, p. 352</ref> and two other [[Nazgûl]] to reoccupy [[Dol Guldur]].<ref name="TA"/>
* Birth of [[Heribald Bolger]], second child and second son of [[Wilibald Bolger]] and [[Prisca Baggins]].<ref>{{App|Bolger}}</ref>
==Note==
As of [[2015]], the published version of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' includes entries for the year 2951 that: [[Elrond]] reveals to [[Aragorn]] his true name and ancestry; Aragorn meets [[Arwen]] in [[Rivendell]]; and Aragorn goes into the Wild. Following research by [[Wayne G. Hammond]] and [[Christina Scull]], [[Christopher Tolkien]] agrees that this is in error and the correct year for these entries should be {{TA|2952}}.<ref>{{webcite|website=HS|author=[[Wayne G. Hammond]] and [[Christina Scull]]|articleurl=http://wayneandchristina.wordpress.com/2015/12/25/tolkien-notes-13/|articlename=Tolkien Notes 13|dated=25 December 2015|accessed=7 January 2016}}</ref> Tolkien Gateway reflects this.
{{references}}
[[Category:Third Age years|2, Third Age 2951]]
